official_title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to abolish the practice of denying pension benefit accruals to employees over 65 years of age.

summary.text: Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to prohibit any employee retirement or pension plan from suspending an employee's benefit accrual or reducing the rate of accrual because of age.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to abolish the practice of denying pension benefit accruals to employees over 65 years of age.
